item.title: Error game Invalid Host
item.dc:creator: @mothaukuka mothaukuka
item.description:
@mothaukuka wrote:

Ok, when Jarring and signing a client - i get this annoying error, which simply states ‘error game invalid host’.

Looking through files i found following in applet.java or whatever.

public boolean method51(byte arg0) { try { anInt12++; String string = getDocumentBase().getHost().toLowerCase(); if (string.equals("jagex.com") || string.endsWith(".jagex.com")) return true; if (string.equals("runescape.com") || string.endsWith(".runescape.com")) return true; if (arg0 != -61) return false; if (string.equals("stellardawn.com") || string.endsWith(".stellardawn.com")) return true; if (string.endsWith("127.0.0.1")) return true; for (/**/; ((string.length() ^ 0xffffffff) < -1 && string.charAt(-1 + string.length()) >= '0' && string.charAt(string.length() + -1) <= '9'); string = string.substring(0, string.length() + -1)) { /* empty */ } if (string.endsWith("no-ip.info")) return true; method47(1, "invalidhost"); return false; } catch (RuntimeException runtimeexception) { throw Class131_Sub2_Sub6.method1495(runtimeexception, "gk.J(" + arg0 + ')'); } }

I’ve tried replacing the IP with 127.0.0.1, my real ip, switching stuff round, no-ip and still nothing, if anyone can resolve i’d be grateful.

Skype : J-drone1995

Read full topic
